title: (SO) MIST monitoring - NC alarm forwarding to eVA for MIST PULL alarms
description:
Description
pull alarms need to be syslog integrated as well
    alarms received from MIST should be injected to eVA
 syslog mapping should be updated
     please update Monitoring table on Mywiki:
  https://mywiki.confluence.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1373136752
  alarms that needs to be handled and alarming build attached
